actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 9:30 a.m. on April 26, 2024.

actions-list.header: Commission on the Future of the Navy
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 1092(b)(1)(A-B) of the James M. Inhofe National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023 (Public Law 117-263), the Democratic Leader appointed the Honorable Filemon Vela of Houston, Texas.

The House received a communication from Mike Johnson, Speaker of the House. The Chair announced the appointment of the Honorable Jennifer A. Kiggans to act as Speaker pro tempore to sign enrolled bills and joint resolutions through the remainder of the One Hundred and Eighteenth Congress.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Dr. Barry C. Black, U.S. Senate, Washington D.C.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Jennifer A. Kiggans to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
